clauses.title: Private messages can be read
clauses.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.
clauses.clause_text: We may pre-screen user messages or files to prevent spam and other abuse,

case.text: Private messages can be read

clauses.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text:
we may
remove any messages or files (including entire rooms) from the Service for
any reason without notice at our sole discretion.

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: We may need your personal information to establish, bring, or defend legal claims. For this purpose, we will retain your personal information for no longer than 7 years after the date it is no longer needed by us for any purposes listed in this document, as per the statutory recommendations.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: The Terms and Conditions may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: We will likely improve this document over time. By continuing to use the Service, you will implicitly accept the changes we make. Your access and use of the Service is always subject to the most current version of this document.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: 'We may block, restrict, disable, suspend, or terminate your access to all or part of the Service at any time in our sole discretion, without prior notice or liability to you.'

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text:
By continuing to use the Service, you implicitly accept the changes
we make.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
clauses.description: Users agree to use the service and its software as provided and accept that any errors within that software may not be corrected.
clauses.clause_text: 'Without limiting the following, we make no warranty that: [...] any errors or defects in the Service will be corrected.'

case.text: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected

clauses.title: Your personal data may be transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: In the event that we sell or buy any business or assets, we may disclose your personal data to the prospective seller or buyer. If we or substantially all of our assets are acquired by a third party, personal data held by us about our users will be one of the transferred assets.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Your use can be throttled
clauses.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.
clauses.clause_text:
Full quote: 'We may block, restrict, disable, suspend, or terminate your access to all or part of the Service at any time in our sole discretion, without prior notice or liability to you.'

clauses.title: Your information is only shared with third parties when given specific consent
clauses.description: The service does not share user information with any third parties unless users specifically give it permission to do so.

case.text: Your information is only shared with third parties when given specific consent

clauses.title: Logs are deleted after 180 days
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that periodically delete their logs to prevent user sessions being tracked over time.
clauses.clause_text: Our logs are kept for no longer than 180 days.

case.text: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time

clauses.title: Archives of their T&C and PN documents are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text: Document history

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
clauses.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.
clauses.clause_text: 'For completeness, your rights under GDPR are: [...] 5. The right to restrict processing.'

case.text: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: 'For completeness, your rights under GDPR are: [...] 2. The right of access. 3. The right to rectification. 4. The right to erasure.'

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your content
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: We do not claim intellectual property rights over rooms, message content or files uploaded to the Service.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
Under GDPR you have a right to request a copy of the data we have of yours in a
commonly-accepted format.
If you would like a copy of your data, please contact us and
indicate as such.

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
clauses.description: The Service takes user suggestions into account to update its Terms.
clauses.clause_text: If you read something that rubs you the wrong way, or you think something should be added - let us know using the contact methods above. We'd love to chat!

case.text: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

clauses.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
clauses.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.
clauses.clause_text: In exceptional circumstances, we may share inforamtion about you with a third party if we believe that sharing is reasonably necessary to comply with any applicable law, regulation, legal process, governmental request, protect the security or integrity of our Service (security audits, for example), protect us and our users from harm or illegal activities, or respond to an emergency which we believe in good faith requires us to disclose information to assist in preventing the serious bodily harm of any person.

case.text: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell your data for any purpose.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself
clauses.description: You have the right to send a counter-notice to the service if you believe the content that was removed wasn't infringing any copyright.
clauses.clause_text:
If you believe that the material you posted on the Service or using the Service was
removed or access to it was disabled by mistake or misidentification, you may file a
counter-notification with us (a "Counter-Notice") by submitting written notification to
our Copyright Agent.

case.text: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself

clauses.title: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.
clauses.description: The Service promises to fairly terminate users accounts, only with a reason, and may give them an opportunity to explain and defend themselves.
clauses.clause_text: If you think we removed your access by mistake, contact us and we will respond with our reasoning.

case.text: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text:
.

Legal basis for processing

Under the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation)

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
clauses.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.
clauses.clause_text:
Most terms of use and privacy documents are unreadable. They are written by lawyers and for lawyers, and in our opinion are not very effective.

We decided to use plain English as much as possible to make our terms as clear as possible. Some sections still have room for improvement - we plan to tackle these over time.

case.text: The terms for this service are easy to read

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.clause_text: The Service may include links that will take you to other sites outside of the Service. We have no control of the linked sites and you therefore acknowledge and agree that we are not responsible for the contents of any linked site, any link contained in a linked site, or any changes or updates to a linked site. You further acknowledge and agree that we are not responsible for any form of transmission (e.g. webcasting) received from any linked site.
